title: Bottom End Service
text:
1.) Disconnect Shifting Linkage
2.) Lower Unit has 4 bolts along with a trim tab and a plastic grate

!! Make sure the trim tab is in the same position as it was, before removal

3.) Take off the 5th piece of hardware. This will be a nut & washer
4.) Water Pump Cover : Remove 4 bolts(6mm) on aluminum shaft that encases the impeller
5. ) Gentilly pry cover and inspect pump housing

!! There will be a key-way, a small slide nut, do not lose it !! 

6.) Apply a small amount of grease to the casing, housing, and everything else
